meanings.sent1: The farmer owned a small aland near the river.
meanings.sent2: The aland stretched out between the two properties.
meanings.sent3: The aland was so narrow, it was like a green ribbon.
meanings.sent4: The aland divided the fields like a natural border.
meanings.sent5: The aland was a thin slice of earth, barely noticeable.

meanings.sent1: The boat will aland at the dock in the evening.
meanings.sent2: The plane will aland on the runway shortly.
meanings.sent3: The spaceship decided to aland on the moon for a change.
meanings.sent4: The hot air balloon gently aland on the soft grass.
meanings.sent5: The bird will aland on the branch gracefully.
